title: Over 30 minute Low Priority Queue
body: So, my friend got a 30 minute LPQ and I don't know if it's a bug or what... If someone by any chance know what might be happening, I would be happy to know.

replies.body:
That's a bit long.  Does it provide the same timer on the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Is it just you who sees the timer, or did everyone see 34 minutes?
Everyone did see it, the LPQ lasted for 40 minutes, and I haven't tried it on Legacy client because BattPlayerTV doesn't have LPQ now.

Thanks for the follow up!  Ask him to hit us up in a ticket so we can take a look and find what happened.  Even if he doesn't have it anymore, it would be good to have it tracked.  Thanks for your help!
Same thing happened  to me. Friends LPQ lasted 40 minutes, shouldve only lasted 20 mins
